content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37.0, y=-85.0)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (39.0,-85.0), and (37.0,-85.0)
- Wooden chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5), and (36.5,-86.5) collecting coal
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5) and (35.5,-85.5) moving coal between components

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining at position(x=-28.0, y=-61.0)
Mining setup with:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) extracting iron and copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) collecting ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5) moving ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) collecting plates

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10.0, y=-59.0)
Large mining setup with:
- Three burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), and (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5) collecting ore
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Smelting Array at position(x=0.0, y=0.0)
Large smelting setup consisting of:
- Four stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), and (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters moving items between components

### Power Generation at position(x=4.5, y=20.5)
Power setup with:
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with pipe connections
- Ensure proper alignment when connecting pipes between boilers and steam engines
- Check that pipe connection points are within valid range of each other

### Errors with fuel management
- Keep coal in inventory before attempting to fuel machines
- Set up automated fuel delivery systems for continuous operation

### Errors with inserter placement
- Ensure inserters have valid pickup and drop-off points
- Check that destination inventory/belt has space before attempting insertion

### Errors with transport belt systems
- Clear jammed belts to allow continued operation
- Ensure proper belt connectivity and flow direction
